commitResults.messageBody:
Chatbot only displays welcome message.

Echo method is required within chatbot.

Echo method created which echoes text from users. It exits when string bye, case insensitive is detected.

Omoh class can only do echo

Functionality of adding tasks and displauing tasks to users is required

Create Class List that stores array of Strings of size 100. Create methods that allow tasks to be stored and retrieved from List

Create Class list so that code becomes neater

Edit Class List such that it now has Class Task added to it.

Functionality of Class Task required such that class variables "String description" and "Boolean isDone" can be stored within the object, telling user what task it is and whether it is completed or not.

mark i, where i is an integer will cause the task with index i to be marked as done

Add extractTaskNumber method in class Omoh to determine the task number user wants to mark
Add markAsDone, markAsNotDone, printMarkAsDone methods in Class List to change done state of task and also to print out the state of tasks

Modify method readUserInput in Class Omoh such that it can detect whether user typed in mark or unmark.

Add extractTaskNumber method in Class Omoh such that according to task numer indicated by user, program can decide which task to mark or unmark

Add method modifyDoneState in Class Omoh to mark task in list as done or undone

Add method printMarkTask in Class List to print out which task was marked or unmarked by user
